page.title: 11My School
page.content: My school is in Harrold. As I live in the neighbouring village of Wymington I come in by coach which arrives at about 8.5O in the morning. Every Monday and Wednesday morning there is band practice and on Fridays it plays in Assembly.On Mondays there is also the String Quartet practice, recorders and orchestra practice. As you can see there is a lot of music being studied and played. The bell rings at 9.OO and we line up and file into our classrooms. our form teacher takes the register and then we go into assembly. Then we go back to our formroom until the first lesson which is at 9.3O.Lessons last 35 minutes each and lessons and classrooms are changed when the bell rings.
